incidents.name: Automated Alert: No Customer Impact

incident_updates.body: We determined that that a small number of JS client connection attempts using the IE1 and AU1 home regions were affected between 11:23 PM PDT and 11:28 PM PDT. The issue is resolved, and there is no further impact to customers.

Upon further investigation, we have confirmed that the Voice client is not affected by the ongoing incident. We are actively investigating the issue causing service interruption with JS client calls in the AU1 and IE1 home regions due to authentication errors and will provide another update as soon as possible.

We are continuing our investigation and have discovered that the JS client calls in the AU1 and IE1 regions are affected by this issue. We expect to provide another update as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service interruption with JS client calls in the au1 and ie1 home regions due to authentication errors. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue causing the authentication errors affecting JS client calls in the au1 and ie1 home regions and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 15 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: A Small Subset of Flex Users Experiencing Stuck Tasks in Teams View

incident_updates.body: Twilio Flex was degraded for 5 minutes between 2pm and 2:05 Pacific Time on06/06/2024. During this time, customers may have experienced stuck task in teams view. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Outgoing SMS Delivery Delays for Subset of Twilio Numbers

incident_updates.body: A subset of international SMS traffic was delayed between 01:57 and 01:58 Pacific Time on 06/07/2024. During this time, customers may have experienced delays in sending messaging. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Issue Loading Some UI Elements to Create Customer Profiles and a Few Trust Products

incident_updates.body: The issue loading UI Elements to Create customer profiles and a few Trust products has been resolved.

The issues loading UI Elements to Create customer profiles and a few Trust products are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating intermittent issue creating Primary Customer Profiles, Secondary Customer Profiles, UK Regulatory Compliance Bundles, Branded Calling Trust Products, and TollFree Trust Products. ISV customers may have issues creating the embeddable Secondary Customer Profile, and Tollfree UI. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

incidents.name: MMS to SMS fallback messages affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio MMS to SMS fallback messages were affected by a deployment on Thursday, June 6th, starting at 3:30 PM Pacific Time. As a result, SMS messages were delivered without the media URL. The root cause has been identified, and a rollback is currently in progress.
